name: OCCULT: Chapter 1
description:
Fear Comes Home

OCCULT is a new Indie Horror FPS Game Series with AAA Quality Visuals and  Four Main Pillars :

            FEAR ,  COMBAT,  EXPLORATION &  ITEM MANAGEMENT.

Experience the Madness and Insanity by yourself.

STORY

Mark Edward receives a call at mid-night from his missing Wife Amy . She only said that "Come Get Me" and sends him  an address. But Mark has no idea what awaits him when he arrives there..

(Featured Youtubers:  Markiplier, Jacksepticeye ,DuckyBhai)

PC Specification

Minimum

ProcessorRamGPU(Vram)HDD Core i5 4th Gen.( 4 Core)  or Above4GB or Above1GB or Above2GB

Recommended 

ProcessorRamGPU(Vram)HDD Core i7 6th Gen.( 4 Core)  8GB 2GB2GB NOTE

1: Game will be updated to a newer version as soon as we receive a bug report or Lag issues. Please Give your Feedback:)

2:Best 3 Speed Runners of this Game will get Our Next Game for free. Make Sure to link your speedrun video in comments.

Enjoy...
